title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 272-2.4 - Disclaimers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 272-2.4 - Disclaimers

State Regulations
(a) General
disclaimers in advertising relating to product availability will not be
considered to be in compliance with the disclosure provisions of sections
272-2.2
and/or 272-2.3 of this

Subpart. Examples of such general disclaimers would be: (1)
"Not all items available at all
stores."
(2)
A statement that a
particular item or group of items is "Available at most stores."
(b) Specific, clear and
conspicuous disclaimers in advertising relating to product availability only in
those stores possessing particular facilities will be considered to be in
compliance with the disclosure provisions of section
272-2.2
of this Subpart. An example
of such a disclaimer would be: "Available only at stores featuring delicatessen
departments."
